original_text: And those to camp next to him shall be the tribe of Simeon, the chief of the people of Simeon being Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai,
korean_text: 그 곁에 진 칠 자는 시므온 지파라 시므온 자손의 지휘관은 수리삿대의 아들 슬루미엘이요

sentences.original_text: And those to camp next to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 옆에 진을 칠 자들은

sentences.original_text: shall be the tribe of Simeon,
the chief of the people of Simeon
being Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai,
